Tower Hamlets Local Plan 55 DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN Supporting text 11.32 This policy recognises that the high levels of growth within the borough are mainly taking place alongside, or within, areas which are already densely inhabited or have been allocated for large scale development. It therefore seeks to ensure development minimises its impact on the local environment, existing and emerging communities. 11.33 Part 1 sets out how the council expects developers to sign up to the Tower Hamlets Code of Construction Practice (CoCP) and a
